actions: poetry run python -m black tests game ./dodo.py
poetry run python -m unimport tests game ./dodo.py --include-star-import --remove
poetry run python -m isort tests game ./dodo.py
poetry run python -m docformatter tests game ./dodo.py --blank --close-quotes-on-newline --in-place --wrap-summaries=120 --wrap-descriptions=120
_json.title: <function _show_cmd(..)>
